code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from"react";import{getAttendance}from"../actions/attendance_actions";export default function Counter(attendance,date){var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useSelector=useSelector(function(state){return state.getAttendance;}),getAttendanceObj=_useSelector.attendance,getAttendanceError=_useSelector.error,getAttendanceLoading=_useSelector.loading;useEffect(function(){return dispatch(getAttendance());});var countFirstTime=attendance===null||attendance===void 0?void 0:attendance.filter(function(item){return item.date===date&&item.first_time==='present';}).length;var countSecondTime=attendance===null||attendance===void 0?void 0:attendance.filter(function(item){return item.date===date&&item.second_time==="present";}).length;var total=countFirstTime+countSecondTime;return total;}
